content: rounds until there are a total of 36 sts 12 12 12 then work the following rounds 1 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog two times k1 k all sts k1 k2tog k2 k2tog two times k1 2-4 k all sts 5 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog k2 k all sts k2 k2tog k2 k2tog k1 6-8 k all sts 9 k1 k2tog k4 k5 k2tog k5 k4 k2tog k1 10-12 k all sts there should now be a total of 23 sts 6 11 6 measure off about 25 yards of yarn cut roll into a ball and stuff inside of beaver for knitting his tail later thread a darning needle with a piece of scrap yarn remove dpns one at a time and thread scrap yarn through remaining live stitches 2 head stitches are now picked up on the original co sts to form the beaver s head beginning exactly opposite of the first co st center of the underside of the beaver s neck and working to the left pu the following number of sts 1st dpn pu 8 sts one for every other co st 2nd dpn pu 16 sts one for every co st plus 4 extra to fill in any holes 3rd dpn pu 8 sts one for every other co st work the following rounds 1 k all sts 2 k8 k4 kfb k1 3 times kfb k5 k8 3 k all sts 4 k8 k7 kfb k1 2 times kfb k8 k8 5 k all sts 6 k8 k10 kfb k1 kfb k10 k8 7 k all sts 8 k2tog k6 k10 ssk k1 k2tog k10 k6 ssk 9 k all sts 10 k7 k9 ssk k1 k2tog k9 k7 11 k all sts 12 k2tog k5 k8 ssk k1 k2tog k8 k5 ssk 13 k all sts 14 k6 k7 ssk k1 k2tog k7 k6 15 k all sts 16 k2tog k4 k6 ssk k1 k2tog k6 k4 ssk 17 k all sts 18 k 5 k15 k4 k last st and 1st st of next round together 19-21 k all sts 22 k1 k2tog repeat to end of round 23 k all sts cut yarn thread through remaining live sts and pull tightly closed insert needle into center of nose and secure 3 tail after knitting the head stuff it and the body firmly place live sts at end of body back onto 3 dpns 6 11 6 and work the following rounds 1-6 ls all sts 7 ls to last stitch kfb kfb ls to last st kfb kfb ls to end every increase round will have a total of four stitches added by adding an even number of stitches the ls pattern can be worked without interruption on the next and following rounds repeat rounds 1-7 until you have worked a total of 5 increase rounds work in ls for 12 additional rounds and then work the following 1 ls to last 2 sts ssk k2tog ls to last 2 sts
